long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add coverage into repository explorer from artefact cobertura file.

If you have create a cobertura artefact on your CI gitlab. This extension get this artefact and apply coverage description in your repository explorer.

For create the corbertura artefact go read this documentation : https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/ci/testing/test_coverage_visualization.html

And after the coverage is automatically apply in your Gitlab instance.

For example show : https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/ci-sample-projects/coverage-report/-/tree/master
